name: goal
label: Goal
help: This is the overall purpose of the call. Provides context for the analysis to guide how the questions/transcripts are interpreted.

spec.name: expected_answer
spec.label: Expected Answer
spec.help: Values could be 'string' or 'boolean' or 'human or voicemail'. Fairly flexible in terms of the expected answer type, and unanswerable questions will default to null.
